comment: She's an ABUSER PROVED by a Jury of her Peers in a Virginia Court of Law and She's been proven to have several Personality Disorders and she's a drug abuser and ALCOHOLIC.
commentable_entity.ask: Petition for ACLU to publicly denounce Amber Heard as an ambassador
commentable_entity.title: Petition for ACLU to publicly denounce Amber Heard as an ambassador
commentable_entity.description: Amber Heard has publicly declared herself to be an ambassador of abused women. Her guilty verdict following the defamation case against Johnny Depp has been internationally viewed as a "hoax" intended to cause damages to Mr. Depp. Her self declaration as an ambassador for the abused is damaging to all the abused. I feel strongly that it is in the best interest of all abused men and women that this petition for the ACLU to publicly denounce Ms Heard will send the message that such behavior is damaging and unacceptable.
